feed.title: Google Cloud: Cluster Toolkit
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cluster Toolkit

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.62.0 is available. This release adds new blueprints for A4X instances and introduces a community scheduler module for Slinky (Slurm on Kubernetes). For more details, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.62.0 is now available. This release includes new blueprints for A4X instances and a community scheduler module for Slinky.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.62.0
